/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The buildings, painted in hues of yellow and beige, stand tall and proud, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a vibrant blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban landscape.
